Text: RE expense reportI agree concerning the timing of the process Please send the receipts to me and have the XMS report sent to me as well Jeff Davis Associate Analyst Recruiting Original Message From Taylor Michael E Sent Tuesday October PM To Davis Jeff D Subject expense report Jeff I just submitted my expense report from the LSU recruiting trip I was told to put your name as the approver I am interofficing the receipts to you Please let me know if you need anything else I would like the process to go as quickly as possible Thanks Mike
